title: Sidebar Bundle Refactoring Modules
details:
v1.6.3.8-v4 Bundle Size Refactoring for sidebar/quick-tabs-manager.js

Created new ES modules in sidebar/modules/:
1. init-barrier.js - Initialization barrier logic, constants (INIT_BARRIER_TIMEOUT_MS, CONNECTION_STATE, etc.), message queue management
2. diagnostics.js - Logging utilities, correlation ID generation, state transition logging
3. health-metrics.js - Storage health probes, dedup map management, fallback health monitoring
4. state-sync.js - State sync constants, saveId deduplication, sequence tracking, pending acks
5. index.js - Re-exports all module functions for convenient importing

Key Pattern: Modules are imported with underscore prefix aliases to avoid conflicts with local declarations while preserving backward compatibility.

Import example:
```javascript
import {
  generateCorrelationId as _generateCorrelationIdFromModule,
  storageHealthStats // NOT imported - defined locally
} from './modules/index.js';
```

Future refactoring: Gradually migrate local state to module getters/setters to reduce quick-tabs-manager.js size further.
